description:
Chiyo finds the Valentine`s chocolates she meant to give to Nozaki, but failed to, in the back of her fridge. Despite Valentine`s being long over, she knows that her feelings of love are still left in the chocolates... She realizes how her life has changed for the better since she became his assistant, and she decides to give it one more try...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If This Feeling Isn`t Love, Then There Is No Love in the World.
Kono Kimochi ga Koi ja Nai nara, Kitto Sekai ni Koi wa Nai.
この気持ちが恋じゃないなら, きっと世界に恋はない.
